Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Asizange yini siwenze umhlaba ube umbhede (indawo yokuphumula) na
Futhi sakwenza ukulala kwenu kwaba ukuphumula
Futhi sakha phezulu kwenu okuyisikhombisa okuqatha
Futhi sehlisela phansi amanzi aphophozayo avela amafini
Ukuze siveze ngawo uhlamvu nokumilayo (izihlahla notshani)
Usuku okuyoshawa ngalo icilongo bese niyeza niyizixuku
Futhi liyovulwa izulu bese kuba yiminyango
Futhi izintaba ziyosuswa futhi zibe yinkohliso
Angeke bazwe phakathi kusona ukubanda futhi angeke (zithole) ukuphuza
Ngakho-ke yizwani, manjalo angeke sininezelele ngalutho ngaphandle	kwesijeziso
Nezintombi ezinhle ezakhiwe kahle ezilinganayo ngeminyaka
Lapho phakathi abayizwa inkulumo eyize noma amanga
Umvuzo ovela eNkosini yakho, isipho esibaliwe
INkosi yamazulu nomhlaba kanye nakho konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili(iNkosi) enomusa, abangakwaziukukhuluma nayo
Ngosuku lapho uGabriyeli nezingelosi kuyokuma ngabolayini, angeke bakhulume ngaphandle kwalowo ovunyelwe (uMvelinqangi)	onomusa futhi akhulume okulungile
Lolo wusuku lwangempela, manjalo noma ngabe ngubani othanda ukuthatha isiphephelo eNkosini yakhe
Ngempela sanixwayisa ngesijeziso esiseduze, usuku lapho umuntu eyobona lokho okuthunyelwe ngaphambili yizandla zakhe futhi bayothi abangakholwa “Oh ngifisa sengathi ngangiwuthuli”
Bathi, “ngakube ngempela siyobuyiselwa yini esimweni sokuqala (sempilo) na?”
Ngakube yafika yini kuwena indaba kaMose
Ngenkathi ebizwa yiNkosi yakhe esigodini esingcwele iTuwa
(Ithi) hamba uye kuFaro ngempela yena wephule umthetho
Futhi ngikuholele eNkosini yakho ukuze uyesabe
Ngakho-ke wamthatha uMvelinqangi ngesijeziso esiyisibonelo sempilo	ezayo neyamanje
Ngempela	kulokho	kunesifundo	kulowo	owesaba (uMvelinqangi) olungileyo
Ngakube nina ninzima yini ekudalweni noma yizulu alakhile na
Futhi wamboza ubusuku balo futhi wakhipha ukukhanya kwalo
Wakhipha kuwona amanzi awo nedlelo lawo
Usuku lapho umuntu ekhumbula konke akuzabalazele
Futhi siyovezwa obala isihogo kulowo obonayo
Ngakho-ke ngempela isihogo sona siyindawo yokuhlala
Futhi mayelana nowesaba isimo seNkosi yakhe futhi anqabele umphefumulo (wakhe) ezikhanukweni
Ngakho-ke ngempela isivande sona siyindawo yokuhlala
YiseNkosini yakho lapho liphelela khona (ulwazi lwalo) ihora
Ngosuku abayolibona ngalo (ihora) kuyokuba sengathi bona abazange bahlale (kulomhlaba) ngaphandle kwentambama noma ikuseni kwalo
Futhi yini engakwenza wazi ukuthi angase ahlanzeke
Mayelana nalowo obona ukuthi akadingi lutho
Futhi mayelana nalowo owafika kuwena egijima
Ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani othandayo akayikhumbule (iQur’an)
Ngakho-ke	uma	kufika	ukukhala	okunzima	(usuku lokwahlulelwa)
Wonke umuntu phakathi kwabo ngalolosuku uyobe ezinake yena
Labo-ke bona abangakholwa, abonayo abenzi bokungalungile
Khumbula nangenkathi izilwane zasendle ezinkulu ziqoqelwa ndawonye
Khumbula nangenkathi izilwandle ziba njengemililo evuthayo (zihlangana izilwandle)
Khumbula	nangenkathi	imiphefumulo	ihlanganiswa nemizimba yayo
Khumbula	kanye	nentombazane	eyangcwatshwa	iphila ibuzwa
Khumbula nangenkathi isihogo senziwa ukuthi sivuthe
Uyokwazi umphefumulo lokho okuwulethile (izenzo ezinhle noma ezimbi)
Umnikazi wamandla kanye nomnikazi wesihlalo sobukhosi osezingeni eliphezulu
Futhi yona (iQur’an) ayisiyona inkulumo kasathane ogxoshiwe (ezulwini)
Lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle kwesikhumbuzo semihlaba (sabantu namajinn)
Kunoma ngabe ngubani phakathi kwenu othanda ukuqonda
Futhi anithandi ngaphandle kokuba kuthanda uMvelinqangi iNkosi yemihlaba (abantu namajinn)
Futhi khumbula angenkathi izinkanyezi ziwa zisakazeka
Futhi khumbula nangenkathi izilwandle ziqhuma (izingxenye zazo zihlangana nezinye)
Umphefumulo uyokwazi lokho owakuthumela ngaphambili nowakushiya ngemumva
Oh muntu! Yini eyakukhohlisa ngeNkosi yakho ephanayo
Yakwenza waba yinoma yisiphi isimo eyisithandayo
Futhi ngempela kunabaqaphi (izingelosi) phezulu kwenu (ezibhala enikwenzayo)
Futhi ngempela abangalungile bayokuba semlilweni wesihogo
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi luyini usuku lokwahlulelwa
Khona manjalo yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi luyini usuku lokwahlulelwa
Lolo usuku lapho umphefumulo ungeke uphathele (omunye) umphefumulo (amandla okwenza) okuthize futhi umyalo ngalolosuku ngoka Mvelingqangi
Labo okuthi uma bethatha isilinganiso kubantu, bathatha ngokugcwele
Futhi	uma	bebalinganisela	noma	bebakalela	banikeza okungaphansi (kwesisindo)
Abacabangi yini ukuthi bona bayovuswa kwabafileyo
Usuku lapho abantu beyokuma ngaphambili kweNkosi yemihlaba
Lutho! Ngempela ukubhalwa phansi kwezenzo (zabonayo) kusejele (esimweni esinzima)
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini ijele (isimo esinzima)
Futhi akekho oluphikayo ngaphandle kwawo wonke (umuntu) owephula umthetho oyisoni
Uma	efundelwa	amavesi	ethu	uthi,	“yizinganekwane zabasendulo”
Lutho! Kepha kunesembozo ezinhliziyweni zabo salokho ababekusebenzela
Lutho! Ngempela bona ngalolosuku bayosithezwa (ekuboneni) iNkosi yabo
Bese ngempela bona bayongena emlilweni ovuthayo
Lutho! Ngempela umbhalo (umlando) wabalungile ugciniwe kwi-Illiyun
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini I-illiyun
Isisicilelo	salo	amakha	futhi	kulokho	abancintisane abancintisani
Inhlanganisela yalo (iwayini) yiTasneem (yisipho sasezulwini esiseqophelweni eliphezulu)
Ngempela	labo	ababejwayele	ukwenza	ubugebengu babejwayele ukuhleka labo abakholwayo
Futhi	kwakuthi	uma	(ababenza	ubugebengu)	bedlula ngakubona bacishelane amehlo
Futhi uma bephindela kubantu babo baphindela benza amahlaya
Futhi uma bebabona babethi, “ngempela laba badukile”
Futhi babengathunyelwanga kubona ukuba ngabalondolozi babo
Ngakho-ke ngalolusuku labo abakholwayo bahleka labo abangakholwa
Ngakube	banikezwa	umvuzo	abangakholwa	ngalokho ababekwenza
Futhi khumbula lilalela iNkosi yalo futhi kufanele likwenze lokho
Futhi khumbula (umhlaba) ukhipha konke okuphakathi kuwona usale ungenalutho
Futhi ulalela iNkosi yawo futhi kufanele ukwenze lokho
Oh muntu! Ngempela wena usebenzele iNkosi yakho ukusebenza okuphelele ekugcineni uzohlangana nayo
Mayelana nalowo onikezwa incwadi yakhe (yezenzo zakhe) esandleni sakhe sokunene
Kepha lowo onikezwe incwadi yakhe (yezenzo zakhe) ngemumva komhlane wakhe
Ngempela yena wayephakathi kwabantu bakhe (bakubo) ejabulile
Ngempela yena wayecabanga ukuthi angeke aphindele (kuMvelinqangi)
Yebo!	Ngempela	iNkosi	yakhe	ngasosonke	isikhathi yayimbona
Kepha lutho! Ngifunga ngobubomvu bokushona kwelanga
Futhi ngifunga nangobusuku kanye nalokho okwenza ukuthi kubemnyama
Ngakho-ke kwenzenjani ngabo ukuthi bangakholwa na
Futhi uma befundelwa iQur’an abajabalali (abakhothami kuMvelinqangi)
Futhi uMvelinqangi wazi kakhulu ngalokho abakugcina ngaphakathi kubona
Ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo okwabo ngumvuzo ongasoze wanqamuka
Futhi	ngifunga	ngesibhakabhaka	esibambe	izinkanyezi ezinkulu
Futhi abazange babahluphe ngaphandle kokuthi abakholelwe kuMvelinqangi ophakeme ngamandla odunyiswayo
Lowo okungowakhe umbuso wamazulu nomhlaba futhi uMvelinqangi ungobonwayo (ongufakazi) phezulu kwezinto zonke
Ngempela labo abalinga abakholwayo besilisa nabakholwayo besifazane bese bengazisoli (kuMvelinqangi) ngakho-ke okwabo yisijeziso sesihogo futhi okwabo yisijeziso somlilo ovuthayo
Ngempela labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo okwabo yizivande okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula, lokho yimpumelelo enkulu
Ngakube yafika yini indaba yamabutho empi
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini okukhanyayo ebusuku
Awukho umphefumulo kepha phezu kwawo kunomlondolozi
Ngakho-ke akabheke umuntu ukuthi wadalwa ngani
Ngifunga ngakho-ke angeke abenawo amandla nomsizi
Futhi ngifunga ngezulu (ngesibhakabhaka) esiletha imvula ngokuphindelela
Futhi ngifunga ngomhlaba ngenkathi uqhekeka phakathi
Ngakho-ke	banike	ithuba	abangakholwa,	bayekwe okwesikhashana ngobumnene
Dumisa igama leNkosi yakho ephakeme kakhulu
Ngaphandle kwalokho okufiswa nguMvelinqangi, ngempela yena uyakwazi okusobala kanye nalokho okufihlekile
Ngakho-ke	khumbuza	uma	kungukuthi	siyakusiza isikhumbuzo
Futhi uyokugwema (ukukhunjuzwa) lowo muntu omubi kakhulu
Bese engafi lapho phakathi kuwona futhi angaphili
Futhi akhumbule igama leNkosi yakhe athandaze
Futhi impilo ezayo ingcono futhi ingehlalayo engapheliyo
Ngakube seyafika yini kuwena indaba yesehlakalo esehlulayo

Isihlahla asondli futhi asisizi ekulweni nendlala
Ngakube abawaboni yini amakameli ukuthi adalwa kanjani na
Ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi uyomjezisa ngesijeziso esikhulu kakhulu
Bese ngempela kuba kuthina ukubalelwa kwabo
Awuzange yini ubone ukuthi yenza kanjani iNkosi yakho ku- Ad
Kanye noThamud okunguyena owagumba idwala esigodini
(uFaro nabantu bakhe) benza okuningi ukukhwabanisa kulona (izwe)
Ngakho-ke iNkosi yakho yathela phezulu kwabo isijeziso
Mayelana nomuntu uma imlinga iNkosi yakhe bese imnika ukuhlonipheka bese imupha (umusa nokunye) bese ethi, “iNkosi yami iyangithanda”
Kepha uma (iNkosi yakhe) imlinga ngokumncisha (noma imnciphisele) isabelo sakhe bese ethi, “iNkosi yami ingidumazile”
Futhi anibancengi abantu ukuthi bondle abampofu
Lutho! Futhi khumbula ngenkathi umhlaba ubuthuzeka wendlaleka ubayizicucu
Futhi khumbula ngenkathi iNkosi yakho iza kanye nezingelosi zingolayini (ngezigaba zazo)
Futhi isihogo ngalolosuku siyokwenziwa ukuthi sibeseduzane, ngalolosuku umuntu uyokhumbula, futhi ukukhumbula kwakhe kuyomsiza ngani na
Uyothi, “Oh ukuba nje ngangithumele ngaphambili (okuhle) kwempilo yami
Ngakho-ke	ngalolosuku	akekho	ongajezisa	ngendlela (uMvelinqangi) azojezisa ngayo
Futhi akekho ongabopha ngendlela ayobopha ngayo
Futhi ngifunga ngomzali kanye nalokho akuzalayo
Ngakube ucabanga ukuthi akasoze abekhona ongaphezulu kwakhe ongamehlula
Ngakube ucabanga ukuthi akekho noyedwa ombonayo
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi indlela eyenyukayo (inzima)
Wayeseba ngomunye walabo abakholwayo futhi abayalana ngokubekezela futhi beyalana ngobubele
Futhi labo abangakholwanga emavesini (ezimpawini) zethu bona (bangabantu) abangakwesokunxele
Phezulu kwabo kunomlilo ovale nhlangothi zonke
Futhi ngifunga ngesibhakabhaka kanye nalowo owasakha
Futhi ngifunga ngomhlaba kanye nalowo owawendlala
Futhi	ngifunga	ngomphefumulo	kanye	nalowo owawulinganisa
Wasewukhombisa okubi kwawo kanye nokuhle kwawo
Futhi ngempela wehlulekile lowo owenze okubi kuwona
Ngenkathi lowo oyisoni kubona eya phambili
Manjalo sabe sesithi isithunywa sikaMvelinqangi kubona, “Ningalithinti, yikameli lensikazi likaMvelinqangi nesiphuzo salo”
Ngakho-ke basiphika (isithunywa sikaMvelinqangi) balibulala, manjalo iNkosi yabo yehlisela phezulu kwabo imbubhiso ngenxa yesono sabo yasilinganisa (kubona bonke)
Futhi ngifunga ngalowo owadala isilisa nesifazane
Futhi mayelana nalowo oncishanayo futhi ozibona ukuthi

Futhi ayimsizi ingcebo yakhe uma esewa (efa)
Futhi ngempela ngeyethu impilo ezayo neyamanje
Akekho oyongena kuwona ngaphandle koyisoni kakhulu

Futhi akukho ngisho nakoyedwa kuyena emseni ukuze anikezwe wona
Ngaphandle kokufuna ubuso beNkosi yakhe, ephakeme kakhulu
Futhi ngempela impilo ezayo ingcono kuwena kuneyamanje
Futhi ngempela iNkosi yakho izokunika ukuze uthokoze
Futhi yakuthola untula umpofu yabe seyiyakunothisa
Asizange yini sikunwebele (sikuvulele) isifuba sakho na
Ngakho-ke uma usuqedile (umsebenzi wakho) sukuma (uphinde uthandaze)
Ngempela samdala umuntu ngokubunjwa (ngesimo) esihle kakhulu
Ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo, manjalo okwabo ngumvuzo ongapheliyo
Ngokho-ke yini lena ekwenza uphike usuku lokwahlulela
Akusiyena yini uMvelinqangi umehluleli wabehluleli na
Funda, futhi iNkosi yakho inobubele kakhulu
Ngakube ubonile yini uma ephika futhi efulathela (iqiniso)
Lutho! Uma engaphezi, ngempela siyomdonsa ngesihlonti
Lutho! Ungamhloniphi kodwa guqa phansi futhi usondele (kuMvelinqangi)
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini ubusuku obunqunyiwe
Izingelosi kanye nomoya (uGabriyeli) zehlika ngabo (ubusuku obunamandla) ngemvume yeNKosi yazo nalolonke udaba
Ukuthula yikona! Kuze kube ukuphakama kokusa
Labo abangazange bakholwe abaphuma phakathi kwabantu bencwadi kanye nabakhonza izithombe abazange bayeke (ukukhonza izithombe) kwaze kwaba yilapho befikelwa ubufakazi obucacile
Isithunywa esivela kuMvelinqangi sifunda imibhalo emsulwa
Futhi abazange baqembukelane labo ababenikezwe incwadi kwaze kwaba yingemumva kokuthi sekufike kubona ubufakazi obucacile

Futhi abazange baphoqwe ngaphandle kokuthi bakhonze uMvelinqangi babeqotho kuyena ngenkolo, babeneqiniso futhi benze umthandazo futhi banikele ngezakaah (ingxenye yengcebo ekhokhwa kwabampofu) futhi leyo yinkolo yeqiniso
Ngempela labo abangazange bakholwe abaphuma phakathi kwabantu bencwadi nabakhonza izithixo bayokuba semlilweni wesihogo bayohlala phakathi kuwona ingunaphakade, labo- ke bona bayizidalwa ezimbi
Ngempela labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo labo-ke bona bayizidalwa ezinhle

Umvuzo wabo useNkosini yabo kuyoba yizivande zangunaphakade okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula, bayohlala lapho phakathi ingunaphakade uMvelinqangi uyothokoza ngabo futhi bayothokoza ngaye, lokho okwanoma ngabe ngubani owesaba iNKosi yakhe

Futhi noma ngabe ngubani owenza okungangesisindo esincane sokubi uyokubona
Futhi ngempela yena usothandweni kakhulu lengcebo
Ngakube akazi yini ukuthi ngenkathi kusakazwa lokho okusemangcwabeni

Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini ukushaya (kwehora)

Ngakho-ke yabenza kwaba sengathi bawutshani obudliwe (yimfuyo)
Ekuyiyona eyabanika ukudla (eyabondla) futhi yabaphephisa ekusabeni
Ngakube uyambona yini lowo ophika inkolo
Ngakho-ke thandaza eNkosini yakho futhi unikele ngokuhlaba isilwane
Ngempela isitha sakho, sona siyanqanyulwa (valwa inzalo)
Futhi nami angisoze ngakhonza lokho enikukhonzayo
Futhi nani anisoze nakukhonza lokho engikukhonzayo
Okwenu yinkolo yenu, nokwami yinkolo yami
Futhi ubona abantu bengena enkolweni kaMvelinqangi ngobuningi

Imisebenzi yezandla zika Abu Lahab iyobhujiswa kanye naye
Umnotho wakhe ngeke umsize (ngalutho) kanye nalokho akuzuza izingane zakhe
